name: comfyui-workflow
description: Universal ComfyUI workflow executor with 33+ workflow templates. Self-describing â€” use --inspect on ANY workflow to discover inputs and outputs automatically. Works with local ComfyUI, Windows Portable via WSL, or remote servers.
author: lyqf22

binaries.name: python3
binaries.description: Python interpreter for running workflow scripts

binaries.name: pip
binaries.description: Python package manager for installing dependencies

runtime.name: ComfyUI
runtime.description: ComfyUI server must be running before executing workflows

credentials.name: ComfyUI Token
credentials.description: Authentication token from ComfyUI settings (required if ComfyUI has auth enabled)
